short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a Google Meet video in a Picture-in-Picture window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display a selected Google Meet participant's video in a Picture-in-Picture window

USE CASES
- Keep your video stream in display while presenting something else in your screen
- Keep a selected participant visible while navigating to other tabs or applications

LIMITATIONS
- In this version, only the participants that are displayed that are visible in the main meeting layout can be selected to be displayed in a Picture-in-Picture window

CHANGELOG
v1.2.3
- Fix participant name getting duplicated in the participants list
- Support displaying participants with the same name as separate items in the participants list
v1.2.0
- Move user selection UI from extension page action into the Google Meet action buttons section
v1.1.0
- Add popup UI informing whether the Picture-in-Picture API is supported in the current browser or not
v1.0.0
- Display a selected participant from the main meeting layout in a Picture-in-Picture window
